variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB1
variable.description: Q1. Exposure to cigarette smoke. In the past year about how many hours per week on the average, were you in close contact with people where they were smoking? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB2
variable.description: Q2. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Since you initially enrolled in the Jackson heart study, Have you begun to use tobacco for the first time? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB3
variable.description: Q3. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Have you smoked at least 400 cigarettes in your lifetime? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB4
variable.description: Q4. Exposure to cigarette smoke. How old were you when you first started to smoke cigarettes regularly, that us, every day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB5
variable.description: Q5. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do you now smoke cigarettes? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB6A
variable.description: Q6a. Exposure to cigarette smoke. How long has it been since you last smoked cigarettes (Months)? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB6B
variable.description: Q6b. Exposure to cigarette smoke. How long has it been since you last smoked cigarettes (Years)? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB7
variable.description: Q7. Exposure to cigarette smoke. How many cigarettes do (did) you smoke per day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB7A
variable.description: Q7a. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Is/Was your current brand of cigarettes menthol flavored? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB8
variable.description: Q8. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do(did) you smoke more frequently during the first few hours after awakening than during the rest of the day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB9
variable.description: Q9. Exposure to cigarette smoke. In the past year, how soon after you wake(woke) up do(did) you smoke your first cigarette? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB10
variable.description: Q10. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Of all the cigarettes you smoke (smoked) during the day, which one would you hate to give up most? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB11
variable.description: Q11. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do (did) you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB12
variable.description: Q12. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do (did) you smoke if you are (were) so ill that you are (were) in bed most of the day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB13
variable.description: Q13. Exposure to cigarette smoke. On the average, for the entire time you have smoked, how many cigarettes did you usually smoke per day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB14
variable.description: Q14. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Since you began smoking, for how many years were you off cigarettes? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB15
variable.description: Q15. Exposure to cigarette smoke. How deeply do (did) you inhale the cigarette smoke- not at all, slightly, moderately, or deeply? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB16
variable.description: Q16. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Have you ever used any other tobacco products regularly, such as cigars or cigarillos, pipes, chewing tobacco, or snuff/dip? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB17
variable.description: Q17. Exposure to cigarette smoke. What is the total number of years you have smoked cigars or cigarillos regularly? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB18
variable.description: Q18. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Over the course of the entire time you smoked cigars or cigarillos, how many per week have you typically smoked? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB19
variable.description: Q19. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do you currently smoke cigars or cigarillos? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB20
variable.description: Q20. Exposure to cigarette smoke. What is the total number of years have you smoked a pipe regularly? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB21
variable.description: Q21. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Over the course of the entire time you have smoked a pipe, how many pipefuls per week have you typically smoked? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB22
variable.description: Q22. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do you currently smoke a pipe? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB23
variable.description: Q23. Exposure to cigarette smoke. What is the total number of years you have used chewing tobacco regularly? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB24
variable.description: Q24. Over the course of the entire time you have used chewing tobacco, how many pouches per week have you typically chewed? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB25
variable.description: Q25. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do you currently use chewing tobacco? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB26
variable.description: Q26. Exposure to cigarette smoke. What is total number of years you have used snuff or dip, such as Skoal, Bandits or Cpenhagen, regularly? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB27
variable.description: Q27. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Over the course of the entire time you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB28
variable.description: Q28. Exposure to cigarette smoke. Do you currently use dip or snuff? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB29
variable.description: Q29. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 1 year have you ever regularly used a tobacco product? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB30
variable.description: Q30. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months , how many cigarettes do (did) you smoke per day? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB31
variable.description: Q31. B. Tobacco use follow-up. How soon after you wake (woke) up do (did) you smoke your first cigarette? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB32
variable.description: Q32. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you smoked cigars or cigarillos, how many per week have you typically smoked [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB33
variable.description: Q33. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have smoked a pipe how many peipefuls per week have you typically smoked? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB34
variable.description: Q34. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used chewing tobacco, how many pouches per week have you typically chewed? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB35
variable.description: Q36. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB30A
variable.description: Q30a. B. Tobacco use follow-up. Is/Was your preferred brand of cigarettes menthol flavored? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36A
variable.description: Q36a. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Bidi [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36B
variable.description: Q36b. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Hookah [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36C
variable.description: Q36c. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Kreteks [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36D
variable.description: Q36d. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Betel quid [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36E
variable.description: Q36e. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Herbal Cigarettes [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBB36F
variable.description: Q36f. B. Tobacco use follow-up. In the past 12 months you have used dip or snuff, how many cans per week have you typically used? Ariva cigarette lozenges [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: TOBBflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9] [Health Practices: Tobacco Use, TOB]

variable.name: VERS
